content: 1 cuddle me by maanel baby blanket yarn john arbon textiles knit by numbers 100% merino dk 250 m/273 yds =100 grams 3 skeins i used 280 grams = 699 meters / 764 yards the color on the picture is kbn 12 needles & notions us 5 / 3 75 mm us 6 / 4 mm cable needle 2 stitch markers blocking wires gauge 2 pattern repeats 24 sts = 11 cm / 4 3 after blocking finished measurements 65 cm x 80 cm/ 25 5 x 31 5 after blocking abbreviations rs/ws right side/ wrong side of the work st s stitch es k knit p purl yo yarnover ssk slip 2 sts and knit together through the back loops k2tog knit 2 sts together kfb knit in front and back of st 3st-­ rc slip 2 sts to cn and hold to back k1 k2 from cn 3st-­ lc slip 1 st to cn and hold in front k2 k1 from cn cn cable needle m marker sm slip marker bobble bind off 2 instructions border 1 with 3 75 mm / us 5 needles cast on 147 sts next row rs * k1 p1 * repeat from * to last st k1 repeat this row 9 more times change to us 6 / 4 mm needles set up row row 1 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 place m p1 * k6 p1 k4 p1 * repeat from * 9 more times or to last 17 sts k5 k2tog p1 place m k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 = 146 sts row 2 ws k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm k1 p6 * k1 p4 k1 p6 * repeat from * to 1 st before m k1 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 body follow written or charted instructions written instructions row 1 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm p1 *3st-­ rc 3st-­ lc p1 yo ssk k2tog yo p1* repeat from * to 7 sts before m 3st-­ rc 3st-­ lc p1 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 2 ws k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm k1 p6 * k1 p4 k1 p6 * repeat from * to 1 st before m k1 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 3 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm p1 *k6 p1 yo ssk k2tog yo p1 * repeat from * to 7 sts before m k6 p1 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 4 ws k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 sm k1 p6 * k1 p4 k1 p6 * repeat from * to 1 st before m k1 sm k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 row 5 rs k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1
